text:
Humid teatime vapor, phosphorescent blue, color burned sky/
A stagnant afternoon, trees clenched - tensed - flexed - clenched/
Shimmering signals, noise/buzz, dehydrated vision/
Glared - staticked/
I select circumstances - avocal - implicit/
Itâ€™s been awhile since I operated in thought/
Not snapshot/
In lists, to tasks, with fragments, out of flow/
Separated from myself, automaton/
Markov state by state, discrete/
I am one, unified, languid or lurching, leaping/
I am, memoryless, in motion/
